title: Weather: Phenomena (Usefulness 1)
description: Traveler usefulness 1/10 phrases for the Phenomena subcategory within Weather. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: Typhoons and fronts of rain often bring about cloudbusts in Japan.
cards.romaji: nihon dewa, taif. ya baiu zensen no eiky de sh.ch. g u ni osowarerukoto ga yoku arimasu.
cards.japanese: 日本では、台風や梅雨前線の影響で集中豪雨に襲われることがよくあります。
